goal.ch: 本課程以觀念及應用為主，儘量避免繁複的理論推導。課程設計儘量讓課堂所學可應用於個人的研究。
goal.en: The objectives of this course are to introduce students the theory of computational chemistry and its applications in research.

outline.ch:
本課程將應用python、Excel等程式語言製圖，課程內容包括:
1. Molecular Mechanics (Empirical Method); 2. Energy Minimization; 3. Semi-empirical Method; 4. Ab Initio and Density Functional Theory; 5. Molecular Dynamics and Monet Carlo:
outline.en:
This course will cover the following subjects:
1. Molecular Mechanics (Empirical Method); 2. Energy Minimization; 3. Semi-empirical Method; 4. Ab Initio and Density Functional Theory; 5. Molecular Dynamics and Monet Carlo:

textbook.ch: “1. W. J. Hehre, L. Radom, P. v.R. Schleyer, and J.A. Pople “Ab Initio Molecular Orbital Theory” 2. M.P. Allen and D.J. Tildesley “Computer Simulation of Liquids” 3. C. J. Cramer “Essentials of Computational Chemistry: Theories and Models”“
textbook.en:
“1. W. J. Hehre, L. Radom, P. v.R. Schleyer, and J.A. Pople “Ab Initio Molecular Orbital Theory”
2. M.P. Allen and D.J. Tildesley “Computer Simulation of Liquids”
3. C. J. Cramer “Essentials of Computational Chemistry: Theories and Models”“

instructMethod.ch:
講授
研討
實習/實驗
個別指導

gradMethod.ch:
作業: 60％
期末Presentation : 25％ 
學習態度: 15％
作業可和老師及同學間互相討論，但不可互相抄襲。抄襲者及借與他人抄襲者該次作業以零分計算。期末Presentation 同學可自行選定一篇和自己研究相關的計算化學論文進行報告, 或由教師指定。“

flexDiscription.ch: 本課程要求學生於十一次作葉中完成實作
flexDiscription.en: Students are asked to finish their Homework independently.

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班、化學學系博士班。
系所:限化學學系。年級:限四年級、延修生。
學制:限學士班。年級:限四年級、延修生。
en: Department:MSc in Chemistry、PhD in Chemistry only.
Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Fourth Year、Deferred Student only.
Type:Undergraduate Program only.Year:Fourth Year、Deferred Student only.
